verses.text: And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, I pray you, O \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and ye \w princes|strong="H7101"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \add Is it\add* not for you to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*?

Who \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*; who pluck \w off|strong="H1497"\w* their \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* from off them, and their \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* from off their \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*;

Who also \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w flay|strong="H6584"\w* their \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* from off them; and they \w break|strong="H6476"\w* their \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, and chop them in \w pieces|strong="H6566"\w*, as for the \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*, and as \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w caldron|strong="H7037"\w*.

Then shall they \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, but he will not \w hear|strong="H6030"\w* them: he will even \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from them at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, as they have behaved themselves \w ill|strong="H7489"\w* in their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* concerning the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that make my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w err|strong="H8582"\w*, that \w bite|strong="H5391"\w* with their \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, and \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*; and he that \w putteth|strong="H5414"\w* not into their \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, they even \w prepare|strong="H6942"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against him.

Therefore \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \add shall be\add* unto you, that ye shall not have a \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*; and it shall be \w dark|strong="H2821"\w* unto you, that ye shall not \w divine|strong="H7080"\w*; and the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* shall go \w down|strong="H0935"\w* over the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall be \w dark|strong="H6937"\w* over them.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft that…: vision: Heb. from a vision\f*\f + \fr 3.6 \ft that…: divine: Heb. from divining\f*

Then shall the \w seers|strong="H2374"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, and the \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w* \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w*: yea, they shall all \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* their \w lips|strong="H8222"\w*; for \add there is\add* no \w answer|strong="H4617"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 3.7 \ft lips: Heb. upper lip\f*

¶ But \w truly|strong="H0199"\w* I am \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w power|strong="H3581"\w* by the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and of \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, to \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* unto \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* his \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, and to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* this, I pray you, ye \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w princes|strong="H7101"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w pervert|strong="H6140"\w* all \w equity|strong="H3477"\w*.

They build \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

The \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* thereof \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* for \w reward|strong="H7810"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* thereof \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* for \w hire|strong="H4242"\w*, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* thereof \w divine|strong="H7080"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*: yet will they \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* upon the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is\add* not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* us? none \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* can \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon us.  +  r 3.11  t and say: Heb. saying *

Therefore shall \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* for your \w sake|strong="H1558"\w* be \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* \add as\add* a \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall become \w heaps|strong="H5856"\w*, and the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* as the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.
